sub_title: Lead QC Microbiologist at Kite Pharma, Gilead.
summary: Dedicated QC Microbiologist with 5 years of expertise in ensuring pharmaceutical product quality through rigorous testing and analysis. Committed to maintaining industry compliance while driving efficiency and accuracy in microbiological processes. I seek to go outside my comfort zone and have took the opportunity to move to the Netherlands to work in the leading CAR-T therapy field, reflecting my strong desire for continuous growth.

projects.title: Masters Industry linked Project Kerry Group

contributors.headline: Lead QC Microbiologist at Kite Pharma, Gilead.

projects.title: Final Year Project
projects.description:
Final Year Project (6 weeks lab based) Titled " Enterococci for use in functional food applications"
 • Preparation of Kanamycin Skim Milk Aesculin Azide (KSMEA) agar,  
• Isolation of proteolytic Enterococci from raw milk and beef samples.
 • Colony PCR using Enterococci specific primers 
 • RAPD PCR- to determine  Enterococci strains isolated 
• Identification of gelE gene associated with proteolytic activity using gelE specific primers 
•Preparation of Skim Milk agar plates for well diffusion assay to measure proteolytic zones using cell free extracts from each isolate
• Antibiotic testing of isolates ampicillin and vancomycin E strips
• Determination of most safe and proteolytic isolate for possible use in generating bio active peptides.

contributors.headline: Lead QC Microbiologist at Kite Pharma, Gilead.

profile_positions.description:
•Writing EMPQ protocols and qualification reports for addition of new clean rooms to support phase 1b expansion according to ISO 14644 standards.
• Leading EMPQ sampling arrangements with EM technicians to ensure sampling and results have been delivered on time to meet suite release.
• Initiating and closing ECs and performing investigations in a timely manner
• Revising SOP’s and work instructions (WRK).
•Leading Change Controls and CAPA’s.
• SME for endotoxin testing and deviations.
• Training new microbiologists.
• Use of MES PASX
profile_positions.title: Lead QC Microbiologist (III)

profile_positions.description:
Senior Microbiologist at Kite Pharma (A Gilead Company), Tufsteen Hoofdoorp, The Netherlands.
Roles and Responsibilities include the following

• Initiating and leading quality investigations where required using QMS Veeva Vault.
• Conducting impact assessments for major/critical deviations crucial for QP batch release in a timely manner.
• Conducting out of specifications (OOS) investigations while working closely with MTS process engineers.
• Writing and reviewing Standard Operating Procedures (SOP), work instructions & test methods.
• Preparing In process EM lot reports for QC Management.
• Environmental monitoring (EM) of GMP clean rooms (ISO 7, ISO 8, EU Grades B, C, D).
•Microbial identification using Bruker
MALDI-TOF.
• Testing methods performed include Rapid Sterility Testing using BacT/Alert 3D, Endotoxin Testing using Endosafe MCS, Growth Promotion Testing, subculturing of excursions for micro identification, plate reading of routine and in process EM samples.
• Performing data review and approval of samples on forms and LIMS.
• Routine maintenance of lab equipment and lab spaces.
• Supporting in preparation for regulatory audits and inspections with QC Micro Management.
• Carrying out monthly GEMBA walks of QC Micro managements and identifying areas of improvement
• Lead analyst in the implantation of continuous improvement plan for QC Micro.
• Supporting Team leader with day-to-day testing operations.
profile_positions.title: Senior QC Microbiologist (II)

company.name: The Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson & Johnson

profile_positions.company: The Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson & Johnson
profile_positions.description:
Roles and Responsibilities

• Performing a wide variety of microbiology, chemistry or biochemistry testing to support utilities, raw material, in process, bulk and drug product release. 
• Testing methods performed include Bioburden, Endotoxin (turbidimetric and chromogenic), Total Organic Carbon (TOC), Conductivity, Nitrates, Odor and appearance, gram staining, sub culturing of EM and Bioburden excursion for micro identification. 
• Providing rapid turnaround of samples to meet manufacturing needs. (Qualification and releasing manufacturing suites, water systems WFI)  
• Performing data review and approval of utility and product samples. 
• Providing support and advice to manufacturing on QC related topics. 
• Initiating and leading quality investigations where required using QMS Trackwise. 
• Initiating and completing , CAPAs and Change Controls in accordance with site procedure 
• Writing new and updates current procedures on electronic documentation system (Gault). 
• Providing training to other analysts and to manufacturing personnel. 
• Presenting technical analytical data to customers, i.e., internal investigations and regulatory inspectors etc. 
• Implementing lab process improvements (5S+ Workflows). 
• Supporting Team leader with day to day testing operations.
profile_positions.title: QC Microbiology Analyst

company.name: Eurofins BioPharma Product Testing Ireland Ltd

profile_positions.company: Eurofins BioPharma Product Testing Ireland Ltd
profile_positions.description:
Quality Control Laboratory Technician based at Eli Lily Pharmaceuticals Dunderrow Kinsale . 
Duties include:

•Incharge of drug products shipment off site for sterility testing 
•Raw material samples off site for external microbial examination 
• Maintenance and monthly calibration of pipettes
• Bottle prep for the utility testing lab for Bioburden, Endotoxins, Nitrate and TOC testing 
•Stock checks of Microbiology laboratories
• Dealing with supplier and vendors 
•Ordering in media, testing consumables and laboratory equipment 
•Sourcing consumables for new testing methods under validation 
•Assisting in microbial ID’s
•Part of the 5’s auditing team carrying out monthly audits of all microbiology labs
•Maintaining high levels of housekeeping with weekly and monthly cleans
profile_positions.title: Quality Control Laboratory Technician (Microbiology)
